Enumeration# IntentParameter.Power

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOSwatchOS 10.0+

```
enum Power
```

Available when `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue`, `Value` conforms to `Sendable`, and `Value.ValueType` is `Measurement<UnitPower>`.## [Topics](/documentation/appintents/intentparameter/power#topics)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/appintents/intentparameter/power#Enumeration-Cases)
